info.name: DucksRow Backend
info.description: Auth, Places, and Admin routes for Dynamic Outing Planner API. Use Login with admin credentials to get a token for Admin Stats.

request.description: Register a new user. Returns JWT and user object. Store token for protected routes.
Login with email and password. Returns JWT. Collection variable 'token' is set from response for use in Create Place.
Logout. Client should discard the token; server may add blacklist later.

request.description: Create a place with dynamic JSONB details. Requires a valid JWT (run Login first). place_type_id must be a valid UUID of an existing PlaceType.

Returns welcome message for admins. Requires JWT with role 'admin' (log in with your seeded admin user via Auth > Login using ADMIN_EMAIL and ADMIN_PASSWORD). Returns 403 if token is missing or user is not admin.
